mapper.sql: pe_.id AS pe_id, pe_.project_name AS pe_project_name, pe_.project_number AS pe_project_number, pe_.name AS pe_name, pe_.source_url AS pe_source_url, pe_.source_username AS pe_source_username, pe_.source_password AS pe_source_password, pe_.source_driver AS pe_source_driver, pe_.source_type AS pe_source_type, pe_.source_primary AS pe_source_primary, pe_.source_port AS pe_source_port, pe_.project_description AS pe_project_description, pe_.project_action AS pe_project_action

UPDATE project_environment
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_number = #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_url = #{sourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_username = #{sourceUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
